items.question: Will this simply be a remake of Let It Be, using the original title of the album, with everything McCartney objected to removed?
items.answer: No. This is a very different film from the first one. It shows a time that was happier than most people would have gleened from Let It Be, and shows far more of the interactions between the group and others.

items.question: Will there be a DVD release? When?
items.answer: A 3-disc DVD has already been released and is on sale and available to view from Netflix!

items.question: Why was this footage locked in a vault for 50 years?
